["Description2M – Sadaf 6, Jumeirah Beach Residence
Walk into your new home, this apartment has had one owner and is in impeccable condition. 
The floors have all been replaced with high quality ceramic tiles in the living, kitchen and bathroom area, and with wooden floors in the bedrooms.
The kitchen has been completed upgraded, all appliances are of a high standard and are included in the sale. A utility area is neatly tucked away on the side. A serving hatch opens out to a spacious dining and lounge area. The balcony affords views across the community.
The maids room which has a full bathroom can be used as such or alternatively for  storage 
Two family bedrooms have ample cupboard space and share a large bathroom with bath.
The master is a really good size and has an en-suite bathroom with shower and dressing room. Once again all have been beautifully upgraded.
The community is vibey and close to 5 star hotels, beaches, supermarkets, retail and clinics to name but a few.
Easy access to Sheikh Zayed Road and to the Metro and Tram systems.
Just move in with your family and furniture no work or repairs need o be done.

descriptions:
['DescriptionWater’s Edge is ideally situated on its own canal and 800m promenade, in the heart of Yas Island. From modern studios to spacious three bedroom apartments, every home brings you the best of Yas at affordable prices, with beautiful views over the canal and beyond.
The destination will feature landscaped gardens, fully equipped gyms, pools and a jogging track that skirts the canal. Residents can also enjoy a waterfront boardwalk lined with cafes, restaurants and shops.
At Water’s Edge, everything moves at your own pace. So for those who enjoy action, the jogging and cycling trails, sport pitches and pools are ideal for getting your heart pumping. While the waterfront promenade brings a relaxed taste of the Med with its stylish selection of shops and restaurants.
About the developer
Aldar Properties PJSC is the leading real estate developer in Abu Dhabi, and through its iconic developments, it is one of the most well known in the United Arab Emirates, and the wider Middle East region. From its beginnings in 2005 through to today, Aldar continues to shape and enhance the urban fabric of the UAE’s Capital City in addition to other key areas of the Emirate of Abu Dhabi.']

-
For more property listings please visit: nadiapro.com
Located south of Downtown Dubai, lies one of the most recognizable neighborhoods in Dubai, Business Bay. True to its name, the area is home to several commercial buildings featuring high-profile offices, banks and shops. Extremely well connected, the lifestyle in Business Bay is ideal for professionals working in Business Bay, Downtown Dubai and DIFC. The area also has some of the leading hotel chains from across the world including Oberoi, Taj, and Marriott. 
With a selection of beautiful apartments, hotel apartments and hotels, it has grown into a coveted address in the city eliciting an equal amount of interest from renters, buyers and tourists. Business Bay is also at closely located to the up-and-coming design destination, Dubai Design District and one of Dubai’s oldest hotspots, Jumeirah.
Stretching over 80 million sq. ft., Business Bay is a prime location in the city, featuring a mix of properties. Most of the residential properties in the area are apartments and the Business Bay buildings are part of Dubai's skyline. There are a few pavilion villas for rent in the Executive Towers compound apart from the Sky Villas and the Marasi floating villas along the Dubai Canal. In terms of the configurations of the properties, you find a large number of studios, 1,2 and 3-bedroom apartments in Business Bay and a few 4-bedroom luxury apartments and penthouses for rent."]

Khalifa City is a residential suburb of the city of Abu Dhabi and is ideal for families, for a suburban lifestyle boasts. Popular with those who want a luxurious property and don't mind being out of the center of Abu Dhabi. It is subdivided into 3 areas: KCA, KCB, and New Khalifa City. All of these are currently being developed into what will become the new city center of Abu Dhabi.
Located on the mainland this large neighborhood is separated from the sea by Al Raha Gardens. The area is relatively quiet and there are no problems with parking.
KCA is a great place to live in if you like a quiet simple life.

descriptions:
['DescriptionSE7EN RESIDENCES rebranded as SEVEN PALM 
BEACHFRONT APARTMENTS ON PALM JUMEIRAH 
Seven Palm embodies urban island living close to the center of Dubai. Nestled in between five-star DUKES The Palm and Oceana Residences on one side and Fairmont The Palm on the other. Walking distance to Nakheel Shopping Mall, Monorail stations, Al Itihad Park and Golden Mile Gallery.
Seven Palm offers breathtaking views of the Arabian Ocean, Marina skyline, the iconic Burj Al Arab and the Dubai Eye. 
A luxury hotel will be situated in the South tower of the Seven Palm project and the residences are located in the North tower. The towers are joined at the top by a stunning one-of-a-kind infinity pool and food and beverage outlets catering to the wants and needs of residents and visitors alike. 
Studio apartments feature high quality furnishings maximizing space with flat screen televisions, fully equipped kitchens and floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light and spacious balconies with spectacular views. 
Imagine relaxed living in an exceptional one, two or three bedroom apartment featuring high quality furnishings, separate air-conditioning controls, flat screen televisions in the living and master bedroom, guest toilet, en-suite master bedroom, walk-in wardrobes, fully equipped kitchens and spacious balconies with spectacular views. 
Duplex penthouses feature private terraces with swimming pools and access to the rooftop infinity swimming pool. Both penthouses have bright open layouts and can be fitted out to your own taste. 
Amenities include an Olympic size rooftop infinity pool in length, fully equipped gymnasium, beach access, lush landscaped gardens and secure underground parking. 
This project is sold off-plan with expected completion due by Q4 – 2020 to all nationalities on a freehold ownership basis.
Visit our sales office located at DUKES The Palm Hotel or call us for your exclusive viewing TODAY!']
